options.name: mc-opt-item-028151441155932844
options.text: I identified the local weather factors that influence the monsoon season in the southwest region of the U.S.

options.name: mc-opt-item-06761015402153134x1
options.text: I researched both local and global weather factors that contribute to the characteristics of a monsoon season.

options.name: _widget_-07348042729720901
options.text: I collected evidence about the history of monsoon seasons in the Southwest to determine if they change over time.

options.name: _widget_-08152868699592657
options.text: I provided evidence to support my claim in regard to monsoon seasons changing over time.
